title: Sarah Brown's Vegetarian Kitchen

description: Sarah Brown tempts the tastebuds with a collection of mouth-watering recipes which will appeal to both vegetarians and non-vegetarians alike. This video shows you how to prepare a variety of delicious dishes which are not only healthy and economical, but also attractive and imaginative. Rated: G
